ygData.subject: Re: What a difference 10 months makes (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe, For some Sylly reason, I started a Troll SK and leveled her to like 8.  She is rather oddly twinked but has only died 2 times.  She kills stuff that is
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe,

For some Sylly reason, I started a Troll SK and leveled her to like 8. She
is rather oddly twinked but has only died 2 times. She kills stuff that is
yellow - no problem and things that are just red give her great xp. So,
with that success fresh in my mind, I started a bard on the test server
(totally untwinked besides my knowledge of where stuff is etc.)

Hehe, a rat in North Qeynos killed me. Two times! I gave up! How did I
ever get 43 levels? My god!

Sylly


----- Original Message -----
From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 <g4mntofcr@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, January 28, 2000 1:42 PM
Subject: [eqbards] What a difference 10 months makes (OT)


> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> The other day I started up a newbie gnome mage.

> So now I've gotten 20PP for a 4th level character that took my bard at
least
> 15 levels to acquire. With the HP buffs, I haven't even died since 1st
> level.
